channel.title: Use Cases on Antal Dániel, CFA

item.title: Jogdíjak meghatározása
item.description: The copyright royalty is the wage of the music performer, composer and producer. Musicians earn their income after their recorded performances when it is played in a public performance or when it is mechanically copied. Like wages and services in a market economy, the remuneration for the use of their work should reflect some sort of market value. In the case of copyrighted music, this market value is a part of the added value in a service.
